name: IPStrategist AI
description: An AI‑enhanced patent portfolio manager that monitors expiration dates, surfaces licensing opportunities, and tracks competitor filings to help IP professionals optimise their intellectual‑property strategy.

tools.name: search_patent_database
tools.description: Searches public patent databases (USPTO, EPO, WIPO) with given query parameters and returns a list of matching patent identifiers with basic metadata in JSON format.

query.description: Free‑text query describing the inventions or technology area.

jurisdiction.description: Country or region code (e.g., US, EP, WO).

assignee.description: Name of the assignee or applicant.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return.

tools.name: get_patent_details
tools.description: Retrieves full bibliographic and legal status information for a specific patent number from the selected jurisdiction.

tools.name: calculate_expiration
tools.description: Computes the expiration date of a patent based on its filing date, grant date, type, and applicable term extensions.

filing_date.description: The date the patent application was filed.

grant_date.description: The date the patent was granted, if applicable.

term_extension_months.description: Number of months of term extension (e.g., patent term adjustments).

tools.name: monitor_competitor_filings
tools.description: Sets up a watch on a competitor's assignee name and technology keywords, returning any new patent publications since the supplied date.

competitor_name.description: Exact name of the competitor or assignee to monitor.

keywords.description: List of technology keywords to filter the search.

since_date.description: Only patents published after this date will be returned.

tools.name: find_licensing_opportunities
tools.description: Analyzes a set of patents and scores them for licensing potential based on citation count, market relevance, and legal status.

patent_numbers.description: List of patent identifiers to evaluate.

tools.name: schedule_deadline
tools.description: Creates a calendar reminder for a given date and description, returning a confirmation identifier.

description.description: Longer description or notes for the reminder.

tools.name: generate_report
tools.description: Generates a markdown formatted strategic report from supplied sections (e.g., expirations, competitor analysis, licensing scores) and returns the report text.

examples.description: User asks for upcoming expirations of three US utility patents; the assistant retrieves details, calculates expiration dates, schedules calendar reminders for those expiring within 12 months, and returns a concise summary.
